text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) OthmanAdi/planning-with-files | 95% | stars now 6093 → est 15794 (range 15759-15829)
   https://github.com/OthmanAdi/planning-with-files
2) HKUDS/DeepTutor | 95% | stars now 7183 → est 13071 (range 13026-13116)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/DeepTutor
3) ophub/fnnas | 93% | stars now 1069 → est 4734 (range 4709-4759)
   https://github.com/ophub/fnnas
4) kepano/obsidian-skills | 93% | stars now 2736 → est 6772 (range 6747-6797)
   https://github.com/kepano/obsidian-skills
5) AnmolSaini16/mapcn | 92% | stars now 4025 → est 7230 (range 7191-7269)
   https://github.com/AnmolSaini16/mapcn

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
